name: .YMD File Extension
summary: Learn about .YMD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a YMD file with Yach*PMS (Windows, Linux). To do so:
Open Yach*PMS and press F3 to open the Load song menu.
Navigate to and open your YMD file.
After you do, the song your YMD file describes will appear in Yach*PMS.
You can also open a YMD file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text editor, to view the plain text data it contains.
You can use Yach*PMS to export the song a YMD file describes as a .WAV (WAVE Audio) file. To do so:
Open the YMD file in Yach*PMS and press F8.
Name and save your WAV file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
